info.name: Hi2 Backend - Complete API v2
info.description: Complete API collection for Hi2 social platform backend with Cloudinary integration

request.description: Register a new user account
Login with email and password to get access and refresh tokens
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout and invalidate refresh token
Get user profile (auth optional; shows additional info when authenticated)
Update current user's profile (requires authentication)
Generate pre-signed URL for avatar upload to S3
Update user's avatar URL in database
Create a new post (requires authentication)
Get all posts paginated, newest first. Auth optional; when provided, includes isLiked
Get a single post by ID
Update post caption (owner only, requires authentication)
Soft delete a post (owner only, requires authentication)
Generate pre-signed URL for post image upload to S3
Upload avatar image directly to Cloudinary (server-side upload). Avatar URL is automatically saved to user profile.
Get avatar for a specific user (public endpoint, no auth required)
Delete current user's avatar from Cloudinary
